00024 #include "MSDataAnalyzerApplication.hpp"

00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <iterator>

00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace pwiz::util;
00033 using namespace pwiz::analysis;
00034 
00035 
00036 ostream* os_ = 0;
00037 
00038 
00039 struct DummyAnalyzer : public MSDataAnalyzer
00040 {
00041     vector<string> filenames;
00042 
00043     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo) 
00044     {
00045         filenames.push_back(dataInfo.sourceFilename);
00046     }
00047 };
00048 
00049 
00050 const char* tempFilename_ = "MSDataAnalyzerApplicationTest.temp.txt";
00051 
00052 
00053 void test()
00054 {
00055     if (os_) *os_ << "test()\n\n"; 
00056 
00057     const char* argv[] = 
00058     {
00059         "executable_name",
00060         "file0",
00061         "-o", "output_directory_name",
00062         "file1",
00063         "-x", "command0",
00064         "-f", "filelist_name",
00065         "file2",
00066         "file3",
00067         "file4",
00068         "-x", "command1",
00069         "-x", "command2",
00070         tempFilename_
00071     };
00072 
00073     int argc = sizeof(argv)/sizeof(const char*);
00074 
00075     MSDataAnalyzerApplication app(argc, argv);
00076 
00077     if (os_) 
00078     {
00079         *os_ << "usageOptions:\n" << app.usageOptions << endl;
00080         *os_ << "outputDirectory: " << app.outputDirectory << "\n\n";
00081         *os_ << "filenames:\n";
00082         copy(app.filenames.begin(), app.filenames.end(), ostream_iterator<string>(*os_, "\n"));
00083         *os_ << endl;
00084         *os_ << "commands:\n";
00085         copy(app.commands.begin(), app.commands.end(), ostream_iterator<string>(*os_, "\n"));
00086         *os_ << endl;
00087     }
00088 
00089     unit_assert(app.filenames.size() == 6);
00090     unit_assert(app.commands.size() == 3);
00091 
00092     MSData temp;
00093     MSDataFile::write(temp, tempFilename_);
00094 
00095     if (os_) *os_ << "Running app with dummy analyzer:\n";
00096     DummyAnalyzer dummy;
00097     app.outputDirectory = "."; // don't actually create "output_directory_name"
00098     app.run(dummy, os_);
00099 
00100     if (os_)
00101     {
00102         *os_ << endl;
00103         *os_ << "dummy filenames:\n";
00104         copy(dummy.filenames.begin(), dummy.filenames.end(), ostream_iterator<string>(*os_, "\n"));
00105         *os_ << endl;
00106     }
00107 
00108     unit_assert(dummy.filenames.size() == 1);
00109 
00110     system(("rm " + string(tempFilename_)).c_str());
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00115 {
00116     try
00117     {
00118         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00119         test();
00120         return 0;
00121     }
00122     catch (exception& e)
00123     {
00124         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00125     }
00126     catch (...)
00127     {
00128         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00129     }
00130     
00131     return 1;
00132 }
